title: Agentic Chatbot using LangGraph
features: Designed and implemented an end‑to‑end agentic chatbot using LangGraph to orchestrate multi‑step reasoning and dynamic web scraping, delivering real‑time, context‑aware responses.
Integrated LangChain core, community, and graph modules with FAISS vector store and Streamlit UI to achieve low‑latency, scalable retrieval and seamless user interaction.
Architected a modular node‑based framework with state management, cutting code duplication by 40% and enabling rapid feature extension.
